tool_description: A simple Django Based API for generating random Quotes from the Huge Database. Fetch a random Quotes. Easy to integrate and customize. Let the fun begin!
name: Quotes API
title: Quotes API

api_list.name: Quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes-api9.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes-api9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://quotes-api9.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes/"

headers = {
